About Me

Let Me Tell You A Little About Myself And What I Do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

Hi, I am Gargi Roy, I'm a Software Developer. I'm proficient in using Springboot, Java, Next.js, React.js, Redux, TypeScript and JavaScript. I've honed my skills for quite sometime and after investing myself in mastering these languages/frameworks, I'm confident that I can positively contribute to your organization.
Until recently, I worked as a Software Developer at Sustainiam, contributing across the core product and platform infrastructure. My work includes building a blog management system with AWS S3 storage, implementing a credit-based usage system, integrating secure payment workflows using Razorpay, and developing a robust email delivery pipeline with attachment support. One of my favourite Applications that I made is a GitHub Finder. In this application, anyone can search for a person who holds an active GitHub Account. They can also get the user's top 10 repositories, their bio, and a further link to that actual GitHub Account.
